document_data.name: Aruugan
document_data.mainbody: '''Aruugan''' was chieftain of the [[hobgoblin]] [[Black Wolf (tribe)|Black Wolf]] clan of the [[Giantspire Mountains]] as of the {{YearlinkName|1479}}.
document_data.Possessions: He possessed one of the ''[[Crowns of Whispers]]'', which made him more persuasive. This item had been left with his people by the [[demon lord]] [[Soneillon]] during the events of the [[Spellplague]] nearly a century prior.
document_data.History:
At some point, Aruugan had pledged himself to the [[god]] [[Bane]].

Under Aruugan's leadership, the Black Wolf clan was one of the only tribes in the Giantspires able to maintain independence in the face of the expansionism of the [[Razor Heart]] tribe and their queen, [[Maaqua]]. Their continued success was thanks to his willingness to take shelter in the [[Dunwood]] alongside his clan's [[worg]] allies.
